review: Buffering and memory full issue...Otherwise good app to view Indian tv

review: never really had clear instructions on it's use.and really don't understand how amazon prime worksall hype no substance

review: The Fire TV Stick seems to work just fine. Sling tv that was kind enough to provide it free still has some bugs to work out though.

review: This thing is pretty sweet man, definitely worth it. Especially when you have prime too.
author: Robert Lawrence

review: The product is good if you don't mind buying a movie every time you want to watch one. I was looking for something that would give me local television and weekly shows.
author: Renee Garth

review: It was fast, simple and easy to install. No issues in signing into applications. Everything is working as planned.

review: The fire stick did meet my needs I look forward to enjoying it .thank you

review: I love my Fire TV Stick. I can watch so many movies on my own couch!

review: One of the most fabulous things I've bought. Super great way to enjoy all the benefits of my Prime Account.
